languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, пилот права — нельзя так рисковать вашей жизнью. Придется выждать, когда силы губернатора разберутся с этой напастью... или у восставших закончатся боеприпасы. Не на целом же складе оных они сидят..."

"Lord Captain, the pilot is right — we cannot put your life at such risk. We will have to wait until the governor's forces deal with this menace... or until the rebels run out of shells... Surely they aren't sitting on a whole depot of them..."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, пилот права — нельзя так рисковать вашей жизнью. Придется выждать, когда силы губернатора разберутся с этой напастью... или у восставших закончатся боеприпасы. Не на целом же складе оных они сидят..."

"Lord Captain, the pilot is right — we cannot put your life at such risk. We will have to wait until the governor's forces deal with this menace... or until the rebels run out of shells... Surely they aren't sitting on a whole depot of them..."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, der Pilot hat recht – wir können Euer Leben nicht einem solchen Risiko aussetzen. Wir müssen warten, bis die Truppen des Gouverneurs mit der Bedrohung fertig sind ... oder den Rebellen die Munition ausgeht .. Die werden ja wohl nicht auf einem ganzen Depot sitzen ..."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the pilot is right — we cannot put your life at such risk. We will have to wait until the governor's forces deal with this menace... or until the rebels run out of shells... Surely they aren't sitting on a whole depot of them..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, der Pilot hat recht – wir können Euer Leben nicht einem solchen Risiko aussetzen. Wir müssen warten, bis die Truppen des Gouverneurs mit der Bedrohung fertig sind ... oder den Rebellen die Munition ausgeht .. Die werden ja wohl nicht auf einem ganzen Depot sitzen ..."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, la pilote a raison ; nous ne pouvons pas vous faire courir un tel risque. Nous allons devoir attendre que les troupes du gouverneur repoussent cette menace... ou que les insurgés se retrouvent à court de munitions... Avec un peu de chance, ils ne sont pas installés dans une poudrière. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the pilot is right — we cannot put your life at such risk. We will have to wait until the governor's forces deal with this menace... or until the rebels run out of shells... Surely they aren't sitting on a whole depot of them..."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, la pilote a raison ; nous ne pouvons pas vous faire courir un tel risque. Nous allons devoir attendre que les troupes du gouverneur repoussent cette menace... ou que les insurgés se retrouvent à court de munitions... Avec un peu de chance, ils ne sont pas installés dans une poudrière. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，飞行员说得没错，我们不能让您这么冒险了。我们必须等待总督的部队解决这个威胁……或是等待叛军的炮弹打光为止……他们肯定没有那么多炮弹……”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the pilot is right — we cannot put your life at such risk. We will have to wait until the governor's forces deal with this menace... or until the rebels run out of shells... Surely they aren't sitting on a whole depot of them..."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，飞行员说得没错，我们不能让您这么冒险了。我们必须等待总督的部队解决这个威胁……或是等待叛军的炮弹打光为止……他们肯定没有那么多炮弹……”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、操縦士の言う通りです。陛下の命をそのような危険にさらすことはできません。総督の軍がこの脅威をなんとかしてくれるか…もしくは反乱軍の弾切れを待ちましょう。彼らの弾薬庫も丸々は残っていないでしょう…」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the pilot is right — we cannot put your life at such risk. We will have to wait until the governor's forces deal with this menace... or until the rebels run out of shells... Surely they aren't sitting on a whole depot of them..."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、パイロットの言う通りですーーあなたの命をそんな危険にさらすことはできません。総督の軍がこの脅威をなんとかしてくれるか…もしくは反乱軍の弾切れを待ちましょう。彼らの弾薬庫も丸々は残っていないでしょう…」

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, el piloto tiene razón: no podemos arriesgar su vida así. Tendremos que esperar a que las fuerzas del gobernante eliminen esta amenaza... o hasta que los rebeldes se queden sin proyectiles... Está claro que no deben de tener muchos...».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the pilot is right — we cannot put your life at such risk. We will have to wait until the governor's forces deal with this menace... or until the rebels run out of shells... Surely they aren't sitting on a whole depot of them..."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, el piloto tiene razón: no podemos arriesgar su vida así. Tendremos que esperar a que las fuerzas del gobernante eliminen esta amenaza... o hasta que los rebeldes se queden sin proyectiles... Está claro que no deben de tener muchos...».

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, pilot haklı. Hayatınızı böyle riske atamayız. Valinin kuvvetleri bu tehditle başa çıkana dek beklememiz gerekecek. İsyancıların da cephanesi bir noktada tükenecektir, cephaneliği basmış olamazlar ya."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the pilot is right — we cannot put your life at such risk. We will have to wait until the governor's forces deal with this menace... or until the rebels run out of shells... Surely they aren't sitting on a whole depot of them..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, pilot haklı. Hayatınızı böyle riske atamayız. Valinin kuvvetleri bu tehditle başa çıkana dek beklememiz gerekecek. İsyancıların da cephanesi bir noktada tükenecektir, cephaneliği basmış olamazlar ya."
